io.socket.socketio.server

Class SocketIoSocket

  • java.lang.Object
    • io.socket.engineio.server.Emitter
      • io.socket.socketio.server.SocketIoSocket

  • public final class SocketIoSocket
extends io.socket.engineio.server.Emitter
    Socket.io socket class. This class represents a unique combination of a single remote connection and it's associated namespace.

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      static interface  SocketIoSocket.AllEventListener
      Callback for all user events received on socket.
      static interface  SocketIoSocket.ReceivedByLocalAcknowledgementCallback
      Callback for local received acknowledgement.
      static interface  SocketIoSocket.ReceivedByRemoteAcknowledgementCallback
      Callback for remote received acknowledgement.

      • Nested classes/interfaces inherited from class io.socket.engineio.server.Emitter

        io.socket.engineio.server.Emitter.Listener

      • broadcast

        public void broadcast(String room,
                      String event,
                      Object... args)
               throws IllegalArgumentException
        Broadcast a message to all clients in this namespace that have joined specified room except this client.
        Parameters:
        room - Room to send message to.
        event - Name of event to raise on remote client.
        args - Arguments to send. Supported types are: JSONObject, JSONArray, null.
        Throws:
        IllegalArgumentException - If event is null or argument is not of supported type.

      • broadcast

        public void broadcast(String[] rooms,
                      String event,
                      Object[] args)
               throws IllegalArgumentException
        Broadcast a message to all clients in this namespace that have joined specified rooms except this client.
        Parameters:
        rooms - Rooms to send message to.
        event - Name of event to raise on remote client.
        args - Array of arguments to send. Supported types are: JSONObject, JSONArray, null.
        Throws:
        IllegalArgumentException - If argument is not of supported type.

      • send

        public void send(String event,
                 Object... args)
          throws IllegalArgumentException
        Send data to remote client.
        Parameters:
        event - Name of event to raise on remote client.
        args - Array of arguments to send. Supported types are: JSONObject, JSONArray, null.
        Throws:
        IllegalArgumentException - If event is null or argument is not of supported type.

      • send

        public void send(String event,
                 Object[] args,
                 SocketIoSocket.ReceivedByRemoteAcknowledgementCallback acknowledgementCallback)
          throws IllegalArgumentException
        Send data to remote client.
        Parameters:
        event - Name of event to raise on remote client.
        args - Array of arguments to send. Supported types are: JSONObject, JSONArray, null.
        acknowledgementCallback - Acknowledgement callback to call on remote ack or null.
        Throws:
        IllegalArgumentException - If event is null or argument is not of supported type.
